name: Mathematics
description: This course contains chapters of Mathematics

chapters.name: Real Numbers
chapters.text: In mathematics, a real number is a number that can be used to measure a continuous one-dimensional quantity such as a distance, duration or temperature.

chapters.name: Algebra
chapters.text: Algebra is a branch of mathematics in which arithmetic operations and other formal manipulations are applied to abstract symbols rather than specific numbers.

name: English
description: This course contains chapters of English

chapters.name: Grammar
chapters.text: In linguistics, the grammar of a natural language is its set of structural constraints on speakers' or writers.

chapters.name: Words
chapters.text: A sound or letter or group of sounds or letters that expresses a particular meaning.

name: Chemistry
description: This course contains chapters of Chemistry

chapters.name: Atoms
chapters.text: An atom is a particle of matter that uniquely defines a chemical element.

chapters.name: Gases
chapters.text: A gas is a substance that is in a gaseous, or vaporous, state of matter.

name: Physics
description: This course contains chapters of Physics

chapters.name: Gravity
chapters.text: Gravity is the force by which a planet or other body draws objects toward its center.

chapters.name: Current
chapters.text: An electric current is a stream of charged particles, such as electrons or ions, moving through an electrical conductor or space.
